orinoco
Class Paper

java.lang.Object
  orinoco.Paper
public final class Paper
extends java.lang.Object

An enumeration type containing the available paper dimension. Paper objects may be cloned, and margins set to a different values to the default paper sizes. The default margins on the predefined paper sizes are 1cm all the way around

Constructor Detail

Paper

public Paper(Paper p)
A copy constructor, taking in an existing paper. By invoking this constructor with a standard paper size, client applications are able to modify the default margin settings

Parameters:
p - the paper to bopy
